```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(fuehrerschein)
library(tidyr)

refactored <- readr::read_rds("../data/refactored.rds")

labels <- refactored %>%
  attributes() %>%
  .[c("names", "variable.labels")] %>%
  bind_cols()
```

# Factors

```{r factors}
refactored %>%
  select(v3, v4, v8:v10, v12) %>%
  plot_factors(.labels = labels)
```
